name: World Process
description:
You will use the CARDS in the game to influence the course of the world and see the various possible outcomes of the human future!
Most of the CARDS will be used in each country, representing the next action in each country!
Various actions will affect the relevant attributes of each country, and may also affect the development of the world pattern!

There are three main types of CARDS: "ideas", "technology" and "engineering"

For example: using the "pay attention to environmental protection this concept card" countries, will start to pay attention to protect the environment, its "natural resources" properties will be increased, also may unlock related environmental protection science and technology CARDS.
Countries that use the "new energy" technology card will begin to research the new energy technology.
Countries that use the "lunar probe" engineering card will start building lunar probes.

The time in the game is not endless, the beginning time is 2011, the game will end automatically after 100 years, if the player can insist on a century not to let the human society perish, will get a continuation of the ending, if not to last 100 years will get other ending!

Features:

  • easy and fast, 10 ~ 60 minutes at a time
  • Rich randomness makes the game process both realistic and absurd
  • Can be turned on or off in the game options to avoid accidental destruction of the world
  • Three endings, 7 endings of continuation, 5 endings of half destruction, 6 endings of destruction, a total of 18 different achievements ending waiting to unlock!
  • 19 concept CARDS, 20 technology CARDS, 19 engineering CARDS, a total of 58 different CARDS! [/ list]
